Package com.dua3.utility.awt

Class AwtImageUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.awt.AwtImageUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageUtil
public final class AwtImageUtil extends Object implements ImageUtil
An implementation of the ImageUtil interface for working with awt images.

    • convert

      public AwtImage convert(Image img)
      Converts an instance of com.dua3.utility.data.Image into an AwtImage. If the provided image is already an instance of AwtImage, it is returned directly. Otherwise, a new AwtImage is created based on the dimensions and pixel data of the input image.
      Parameters:
      img - the Image to be converted
      Returns:
      the converted AwtImage instance

    • convert

      public Image convert(AwtImage img)
      Converts an AwtImage to a generic Image. This method accepts an instance of AwtImage and directly returns it as a generic Image.
      Parameters:
      img - the AwtImage to be converted
      Returns:
      the provided AwtImage cast as a generic Image

    • convert

      public AwtImage convert(BufferedImage img)
      Converts a BufferedImage to an AwtImage.
      Parameters:
      img - the BufferedImage to be converted
      Returns:
      the converted AwtImage
